org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.stats

Class IndicesStatsRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.ContextHolder
      • org.elasticsearch.transport.TransportMessage<TransportRequest>
        • org.elasticsearch.transport.TransportRequest
          • org.elasticsearch.action.ActionRequest<T>
            • org.elasticsearch.action.support.broadcast.BroadcastOperationRequest<IndicesStatsRequest>
              • org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.stats.IndicesStatsRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndicesRequest, IndicesRequest.Replaceable, Streamable

    public class IndicesStatsRequest
extends BroadcastOperationRequest<IndicesStatsRequest>
    A request to get indices level stats. Allow to enable different stats to be returned.

    By default, all statistics are enabled.

    All the stats to be returned can be cleared using clear(), at which point, specific stats can be enabled.
